flow.name: messageListBPFlow

db:select.db:parameterized-query: SELECT ms.id,m.name, m.msisdn, ms.community_id, ms.status, ms.message, ms.message_date, ms.status FROM felo.member_community mc INNER JOIN felo.messages ms ON mc.member_id=ms.member_id INNER JOIN felo.members m ON mc.member_id=m.id WHERE ms.community_id=#[originalPayload['communityID']] AND (m.msisdn=(SELECT m.msisdn FROM felo.member_community mc INNER JOIN felo.messages ms ON mc.member_id=ms.member_id INNER JOIN felo.members m ON mc.member_id=m.id WHERE mc.community_id=#[originalPayload['communityID']] group by m.msisdn) OR m.msisdn=#[originalPayload['msisdn']]) group by ms.id
